item.title: Detect Orientation Change on Mobile Devices
item.description: Media Queries: @media screen and (orientation: landscape) { /* landscape */ } @media screen and (orientation: portrait) { /* portrait */ } resize Event: window.addEventListener('resize', function() { if (window.innerWidth > window.innerHeight) { // landscape } else { // portrait } }, false); orientationchange Event: window.addEventListener('orientationchange', function() { switch (window.orientation) { case -90: case 90: // landscape break; default: // portrait break; } }, false);

item.title: Prevent touch event click underneath layer
item.description: 延迟事件处理(>300ms)： $('#mask').on('tap', function() { setTimeout(function() { $('#mask').hide(); }, 400); }); 使用 touchstart 或 touchend： $('#mask').on('touchend', function(e) { setTimeout(function() { $('#mask').hide(); }, 300); e.preventDefault(); }); 使用 fastclick $(function() { FastClick.attach(document.body); });

item.title: Detect mobile devices
item.description: function isMobileDevice() { return (typeof window.orientation !== 'undefined') || (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('IEMobile') !== -1); } or if(/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent)) { alert('Mobile Detected'); } see also: mobile-detect
